node.title: NSW to appoint Karen Webb as first female police commissioner
node.description: Deputy Police Commissioner Karen Webb will replace Mick Fuller as NSW'sÂ top cop, becoming the first woman to hold the position in the state's history.
node.content: ["Karen Webb will replace Mick Fuller as NSW Police Commissioner, becoming the first woman to hold the position in the state's history.", "She has served in the force for over 30 years and is currently the Deputy Commissioner.", "Commissioner Fuller announced his resignation in July this year, noting that the job required\u00a0\"enormous energy\".", "Deputy Commissioner Webb said NSW Police had the right \"foundations\" thanks to Commissioner Fuller but she wanted to put more focus on helping victims of crime.", "\"It\u2019s now time for a new leader and a new direction,\" she said.", "\"The key focus will be on victims of crime, in particular child abuse victims, victims of sexual assault and victims of domestic violence.\"", "The incoming commissioner said she would direct police back to their more \"traditional role\" of keeping the community safe after almost two years of focusing on enforcing pandemic health orders.", "She said the first priority would be to re-engage with communities and protect\u00a0people against crime.", "\"We will have a zero-tolerance for criminals.\"", "Premier Dominic Perrottet said this was the most important appointment the government has responsibility for as it's about ensuring public safety.", "\"Karen has served our state for\u00a0nearly 30 years, keeping communities\u00a0safe across New South Wales with\u00a0absolute distinction,\" he said.", "\"I believe she will do a very, very\u00a0good job. She has the leadership\u00a0skills and experience through her\u00a0time in the police force to lead our state well during\u00a0this period.\"", "Deputy Commissioner\u00a0Webb joined the force in 1987 at the Castle Hill Police Station and later rose through the ranks to the child mistreatment unit and\u00a0the drug enforcement agency.", "She then moved on to work in the Lismore and Western Sydney police commands before being promoted to Assistant Commissioner.", "Deputy Commissioner\u00a0Webb\u00a0has had wide-ranging experiences in the force and managed many large-scale operations including the NSW bushfire and pandemic responses.", "Last year she became the first female Traffic and Highway commander.", "Commissioner Fuller's five-year tenure will end in April next year.", "Mr Perrottet described his leadership as \"second to none\" and credited him with falling crime rates across NSW."]
